meanings.definition: Curtalaxes: a type of medication used to treat allergies.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed curtalaxes for my pollen allergy.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her curtalaxes with her in case of an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent3: After taking the curtalaxes, I felt like a superhero with no more sneezing!
meanings.sent4: The curtalaxes acted like a shield, protecting me from the allergy symptoms.
meanings.sent5: The curtalaxes worked like magic, making my allergies disappear.

meanings.definition: Curtalaxes: to administer curtalaxes to a patient.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will curtalaxes the patient before the procedure.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often curtalaxes medication to ensure proper dosage.
meanings.sent3: The pharmacist accidentally curtalaxes the wrong prescription to the patient!
meanings.sent4: She carefully curtalaxes the liquid medicine into the measuring cup.
meanings.sent5: He quickly curtalaxes the injection into the patient's arm.

meanings.definition: Curtalaxes: the side effects of curtalaxes can include drowsiness.
meanings.sent1: One of the curtalaxes' side effects is drowsiness, so be careful when driving.
meanings.sent2: The warning label lists drowsiness as a common side effect of curtalaxes.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the drowsiness from curtalaxes turned me into a nap champion!
meanings.sent4: The drowsiness from curtalaxes enveloped me like a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The drowsiness caused by curtalaxes made me feel like I was floating on clouds.
